title: TEAM WIXA: Space Exploration & First Contact Novel
description: Jose and Ema were Czmanks from Planet Wurba. They were part of the ongoing search for intelligent extraterrestrial life with the support of newly discovered Phane technology. They found many civilizations by investigating alien Phane signals within the Wixa.It happened when they were investigating a mysterious spaceship that crashed on planet Woyage. Jess was stranded on a deserted island. Would his crew be able to find him? Who is trying to control them? What will they find? What will be their ultimate fate?This story examines the Earth's history before 8,000 BC with the view of an alien astronaut team. This may be the truth we still have not to uncover.Fans of thoughtful space exploration science fiction will enjoy this space exploration, first contact adventure. This is the first book in the Aliens Worlds Novels, a thrilling addition to space travel fiction.
author: Istoria MAK
